attributes.action: make illegal the operation of any sharia court in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should ban any sharia court and remove from this country any religious leader who supports or gives credence to such a court.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make illegal the operation of any sharia court in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
